title: Create Project Kick-off Deck
description: An agent must create a standard project kick-off presentation from an SOW.

tasks.description: Extract project scope, timeline, team members, and key deliverables from the SOW.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately extracts all key information.

tasks.description: Populate a standard kick-off presentation template with the extracted information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills slides for 'Project Goals', 'Scope', 'Timeline', 'Team', and 'Ways of Working'.

tasks.description: Generate a 'Next Steps' slide outlining the immediate activities for the first two weeks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear and actionable next steps slide.
